pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical User Interface for Generalized Multistate Simulation Model // A graphical user interface for the R package Gems. Apart from the functionality of Gems package in the Graphical User interface, GUIgems allows adding states to a defined model, merging states for the analysis and plotting progression paths between states based on the simulated cohort. There is also a module in the GUIgems which allows to compare costs and QALYs between different cohorts.
